summary: SurgiPaw - A surgical case management application with case tracking, dashboard, and task management features

existing_features.title: Change the sex field display format on the Case Card to show 'Female', 'Female Spayed', 'Male', or 'Male Neutered' instead of the current format
Update the application name from 'Surgery Case Log' to 'SurgiPaw' in all user-facing locations including the page title, manifest, and any branding text
Create a new Dashboard view that displays a list of all open tasks across all cases and provides a tally count of how many open tasks exist

new_feature_requests.summary: Display sex on Case Card as: Female, Female Spayed, Male, or Male Neutered
Create Dashboard that lists/provides a tally of open tasks
